title: Tirex-Network
author: Tirex-Network
content: WEB: https://stake.tirex.cashhttps://tirex.networkBUY: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xE43172ff3ccFE621c0e38589Ba2C5b5B02Fc27A7CHART:https://dex.guru/token/0xE43172ff3ccFE621c0e38589Ba2C5b5B02Fc27A7-bscCONTRACT:0xE43172ff3ccFE621c0e38589Ba2C5b5B02Fc27A7We present to your attention a subsidiary project from Tirex.Network - this is the first project that provides a staking service for life, regardless of your liquidity. The main branch of Tirex.Network is located at the link - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5398188What do we offer:Mining (Staking) without equipment, without electricity costs has become real and very reliable.You're forgetting what it's like to keep track of equipment. You do not transfer money to anyone as in cloud mining. Everything is monitored by a Smart Contract.Name: TirexTicker: TRXTotal offer: 500.000.000 million TirexNumber of distributed tokens during staking: 50 TirexTime to receive tokens: every 10 minutesInitial staking:Developers \ We - have sent only 1.000.000 million Tirex tokens to staking to start the project and we (the developers) are not going to staking more than it should be, these funds will only go to marketing in the future.Airdrop:Also, a unique airdrop is waiting for you soon. You will receive the father's Tirex coin created on CryptoNight - 1 to 1 invested in the stake, the Tirex child token. Answers on questions:How to get rewarded for staking Tirex?To receive staking rewards, you need to stake Tirex and you will automatically receive staking results every 10 minutes forever.How does staking work?Tirex is a token that uses this protocol and uses write logic to create a new token every 10 minutes.How much Tirex will I earn if I stake my tokens?You will receive a staking result every 10 minutes forever. The calculation is derived from the personal percentage you burned to the total amount of staking inventory.What is my payback?The payback will depend on the total number of tokens sent for staking. To calculate the payback, you can use our calculator on the site https://stake.tirex.cash/
